name: The Odin Project - Dark
description:
Dark theme for The Odin Project.
It is a work in progress and my first style, so please bear with me if problems occur.
additional_info:
The Odin Project Dark Theme 1.3.0 - 2018/11/10 -------------- Release notes Inline code blocks given background to improved legibility Fixed font color on some pre code blocks 1.2 beta - 2018/22/02 -------------- Release notes Curriculum text color fixed after logging in Tweaked code background for increased contrast between it and the page Footer link color 1.1 beta - 2018/25/01 -------------- Release notes
  1. An attempt to fix Chrome compatibility.
1.0 beta - 2018/24/01 -------------- Release notes This is a work in progress
  1. Curriculum pages was a priority in this release.
  2. Base dark theme applied to curriculum pages and home page.
